properties.description: Pole mounted Flock Safety camera observing South bound traffic. Stock pole mount with attached solar panel. Presumed to be operated at the request of the Bowling Green-Warren County Drug Task Force / Warren County Sheriff's Office.

properties.description: KYTC-operated (via TRIMARC) pole-mounted PTZ traffic camera and equipment cabinet. Labeled on map at goky.ky.gov as "US 231 NB @ MP 5.3 - at Natcher Pkwy" and "CCTV03010 in Warren County".
properties.name: US 231 NB @ MP 5.3 - at Natcher Pkwy
properties.note: Accessing the still JPG at attached URL shows a live image updated approximately 18 seconds.
